title: Bug 18705: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: The Control Example has excessive flashing. The cause of this issue is unknown.
OB: When running the Control Example and resizing the window only in the vertical direction, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
EB: The Control Example should not display excessive flashing when resizing the window vertically. It should provide a smooth and stable user experience.
SR: To reproduce the issue:  1. Run the Control Example. 2. Resize the window in the vertical direction only. 3. Observe that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
